thread.title: DSP turns choreographer with Kumari 21F
thread.title_full: DSP turns choreographer with Kumari 21F - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: DSP turns choreographer with Kumari 21F
text: Devi Sri Prasad, or DSP as he is popularly known, is one of the most enigmatic music composers in the South. He has done a handful of big budget films featuring top stars. While DSP is well known for his hit songs, it is no secret that he also entertains his fans wih his dances at audio launch events and award functions. Now, DSP has reportedly spread his talent onto the silver screen. According to sources, Devi Sri Prasad choreographed a song in Kumari 21F, the debut production of his close friend and longtime collaborator, Sukumar. Speaking about DSP's new achievement, Sukumar reportedly said that the song came out quite well on screen and that audiences will be "surprised to see the other side of DSP". Kumari 21F, directed by Surya Prathap, features young actors Raj Tarun and Heebah Patel. The film will release on October 30.
